item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Sorry, I found out the answer myself, its in NPCHandler

I was looking through the Barrows tutorial when I was asked to add something under:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomAbyssal(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

I cannot find that in my client.java.

Read full topic
